channel.title: WebTorrent on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in WebTorrent on LiaScript

item.title: Sharing Content via WebTorrent
item.description: This demo from the eLearning-Africa Conference 2024, shows how to use WebTorrent to share educational content with LiaScript.

item.title: Serverless Online Education
item.description: The presentation at the Open Educa Berlin (OEB) Conference on November 24th 2023 focused on “Serverless Online Education” and emphasized the potential of decentralized, browser-based technologies in educational settings.
